ul.li: ftitle – Add title to figure window.
highlight – Highlight specified range or date range in a graph.
maxfigure – Create graphics window stretched across the screen.
movetosubplot – Move an existing axes object or legend to specified subplot position.
plotpp – Plot prior and/or posterior distributions and/or posterior mode.
plotneigh – Plot local behaviour of objective function after estimation.
vline – Add vertical line with text caption at the specified position.
zeroline – Add zero line if Y-axis limits include zero.

folder.h3: Getting on-line help on qreport functions
